Banner.1:
Explore and experience 
 Beauty paradise right near you 
 Beautyx.vn

Home.Mini_map_title:
Thousands of partners 
 are prestigious spa brands at home and abroad
Home.Mini_map_title_1:
Easily review and choose 
 your favorite beauty products, services, and locations
Home.Mini_map_item_1: Find exactly what you need with advanced filtering by desired category, location and price range
Home.Mini_map_item_2: Provide you with detailed information of businesses such as: photos, addresses, reviews, working hours, ...
Home.Mini_map_item_3: Show your business location on the map and give you directions to your desired beauty destination
Home.Order_title:
Order products, make service appointments 
 and pay online right on the platform
Home.Order_step_2: Add products and services to cart
Home.Ca_title_2: Keep track of appointments by day, week, month
Home.Ca_title_3: Notification of appointment reminder when scheduled
Home.Ca_text_1: You will not have to worry about the same appointment when booking at too many places. The system will notify you immediately if you accidentally choose the wrong time slot
Home.Ca_text_2: Viewing the appointment schedule by day, week, month will help you understand the appointment schedule and arrange a reasonable time. Fastest update of booking statuses (Confirmed, unconfirmed, completed and canceled appointments)
Home.Ca_text_3: The system will send appointment reminders to your phone or email so you don't miss any appointments.
Home.Flat_form: In addition, when using Booking Flatform Myspa you can also
Home.Flat_form_item_1: Save business information you have visited and your information at that business including (Name, number of points earned, balance, class, ...)
Home.Flat_form_item_2: Review the list of products and services you have used right on the homepage. It is very convenient if you want to order a certain product or service many times
Home.Flat_form_item_3: The fastest update of promotions at favorite spas. You won't worry about missing out on any offers. Comfortably beautify with the most economical cost.
Home.Sign_tile:
Register an account at Myspa Booking Flatform 
 for the best experience

partner.online_business: Online business platform for the beauty industry
partner.intro:
Booking Online is currently a business trend in the digital age, when users spend most of their daily time accessing, learning and using services on the internet. Beauty service industry such as spa, salon, clinic, beauty salon is no exception. 
 Learning to adapt to the era of digital transformation 4.0 will help businesses reach a large number of potential customers, increase revenue, and reduce costs. From now on, become a partner of Myspa to own the following benefits:
partner.sell_products: Sell products and services right on the platform, proactively approach customers.
partner.customers: Customers set their own schedule, limiting information errors order
partner.regional: The regional search feature makes the business an option prioritize when customers search for places near home.
partner.support: Supporting businesses to connect directly with customers, consulting, make an appointment
partner.simplify: Simplify appointment status updates before, during and after the customer uses the service through the customer interface row
partner.a_place: A place for businesses to post images, information, reviews price, increase the ability to promote the brand
partner.create: Create a beauty community, so that both businesses and customers can can share and exchange experiences with each other
partner.create_a_beauty: Create a beauty community, so that both businesses and customers can can share and exchange experiences with each other
partner.become_a_myspa: Become a Myspa partner to make your business more efficient during this period pass arguments

acc.update_acc: Fully update personal information to make the account better security
